name: Bhavana
wishText: May you manifest all your dreams and desires this year.
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Looking forward to hearing more lion soup jokes from 22 (21?) year old you.
replayText: Wishing you Success and Happinness for years to come.
diff: A song for all your problems
